title: Catching Up With Hannah G
description:
This week on Bachelor Happy Hour, Becca and Michelle catch up with Bachelor Nation fave Hannah Godwin fresh off her trip to Coachella! 

In their conversation, Hannah discusses her thoughts on why it’s important to go into “Paradise” single, how she got the idea to create her app “Setty,” and why TikTok is better than Instagram. Plus, she talks Coachella fashion and reveals how far she and Dylan have gotten in planning their upcoming wedding! 

Then, Becca and Michelle share their thoughts on a wild week of Bachelor Nation news, and Becca addresses a comment about Thomas head-on.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Thanks to our sponsors: 

Rothy’s: Rothys.com/BHH 

Native: Nativedeo.com/BHH
